import React from 'react'; import { ArrowUpRight } from "lucide-react"; const Hero = () => { const floatingCards = [ { id: 1, imgSrc: "cat.png", title: "Book Grooming Section", description: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur.", }, { id: 2, imgSrc: "pet.png", title: "Book Grooming Section", description: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur.", }, { id: 3, imgSrc: "cat.png", title: "Book Grooming Section", description: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur.", }, ]; return (
{/* Left Section */}

Best Help
For Your
Lovely Pets

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur. Id sem amet mattis feugiat dolor turpis ut eu viverra.

{/* Action Cards */}
{/* Go To Our Store */}

Go To Our Store

{/* Book Grooming Section */}

Book Grooming Section

From Our Specialist

{/* Center Section - Dog Image */}
{/* Right Section - Floating Cards */}
{floatingCards.map((card) => (

{card.title}

{card.description}

))}
); }; export default Hero;
